category_subtitle: Super Bowl LX Week ‚Äî Awards Night in San Francisco

rounds.pro_tip: CROWD DETAIL: Real crowd photos show natural variation ‚Äî different heights, blurry faces in background, random clothing. AI crowds often clone faces or create eerie uniformity.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî golden football trophy on podium (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: REFLECTIONS: Real metallic surfaces reflect their actual environment. AI trophies often have generic, impossible reflections that don't match the surrounding scene.
LENS FLARE: Real photos capture authentic lens flare from bright lights ‚Äî uneven, asymmetric, with ghosting. AI lens flares tend to be perfectly circular and symmetrically placed.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî aerial view of lit stadium at night (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: ARCHITECTURE SYMMETRY: Real stadiums have slight imperfections ‚Äî uneven wear, random lighting. AI stadiums often look impossibly perfect and symmetrical.
FABRIC WRINKLES: Real suits and clothing have natural, gravity-driven creases. AI fabric often has wrinkles that defy physics or look painted on.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî red carpet event with spotlights (DALL-E 3)
rounds.pro_tip: BACKGROUND PEOPLE: Look at people in the background. AI often generates figures with melted features, missing limbs, or merged bodies.
MOTION BLUR: Real action shots have directional, consistent motion blur. AI motion blur is often applied randomly or inconsistently across the frame.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî close-up football on grass with stadium lights (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: TEXT ON OBJECTS: Look at text on the football. AI almost always generates garbled, nonsensical lettering ‚Äî one of the easiest tells.
DEPTH OF FIELD: Real cameras create natural bokeh with smooth falloff. AI often has abrupt focus transitions or inconsistent blur across equidistant objects.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî celebration confetti shower on stage (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: CONFETTI & PARTICLES: Real confetti has random shapes, varied rotation, and casts micro-shadows. AI confetti pieces often look copy-pasted or float impossibly.
